ontology.name: GeoSPARQL
ontology.description: The OGC GeoSPARQL standard supports representing and querying geospatial data on the Semantic Web

ontology.name: OGC Simple Features
ontology.description: ISO 19125-1:2004 establishes a common architecture for geographic information and defines terms to use within the architecture. It also standardizes names and geometric definitions for Types for Geometry

ontology.name: DCMI Metadata Terms
ontology.description: This document is an up-to-date specification of all metadata terms maintained by the Dublin Core Metadata Initiative, including properties, vocabulary encoding schemes, syntax encoding schemes, and classes.

ontology.name: Dublin Core Metadata Element Set
ontology.description: This document is an up-to-date specification of all metadata terms maintained by the Dublin Core Metadata Initiative

ontology.name: Basic Formal Ontology (BFO)
ontology.description: The Basic Formal Ontology (BFO) is a small, upper-level ontology that is designed for use in supporting information retrieval, analysis and integration in scientific and other domains

ontology.name: Information Artifact Ontology
ontology.description: The Information Artifact Ontology (IAO) is a new ontology of information entities, originally driven by work by the OBI digital entity and realizable information entity branch.

ontology.name: Time Ontology in OWL
ontology.description: OWL-Time is an OWL-2 DL ontology of temporal concepts, for describing the temporal properties of resources in the world or described in Web pages
